item.title: Azure Services
item.author: Sharad
item.description: Azure Event Hubs Azure Event Hubs is a managed, real-time, event streaming platform provided by Microsoft Azure. It is a highly scalable and flexible platform that can process millions of events per second. Here is a high-level overview of how Azure Event Hubs works: Data Ingestion: Applications send data to Azure Event Hubs using a sender client library. The data can be sent in any format such as JSON, XML, or binary.
